property.name: resolution
property.description: minimum change the hygrometer detects, example 0.01

property.name: max_calibrated_rh
property.description: Maximum relative humidity where the detection accuracy is at it's best

property.name: min_calibrated_rh
property.description: Minimum relative humidity where the detection accuracy is at it's best

property.name: max_calibrated_temp
property.description: Maximum temperature where the detection accuracy is at it's best

property.name: min_calibrated_temp
property.description: Minimum temperature where the detection accuracy is at it's best

property.name: accuracy_calibrated
property.description: average error margin while inside the calibrated ranges

property.name: accuracy_other
property.description: average error margin while outside the calibrated ranges

property.name: max_measure_time
property.description: maximum amount of time needed for a measurement

property.name: min_measure_time
property.description: minimum amount of time needed for a measurement

property.name: device_type
property.description: the technique the hygrometer detects relative humidity
